thread.section_title: Avgearshop.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avgearshop.com | avgearshop.com
thread.title: ed

author: ed
title: ed
text:
I just received my second online order from AV Gear...i was quite impressed by the efficiency that the first order was processed...packaged and shipped at no extra cost.
Looking to purchase the latest Fiio DAP the X5 III...I checked out Amazon and a electronics shop in the Ottawa area..only to not find any listings. So I went over to the AV Gear Shop website...not only did they have the item in stock...but it was featured on Sale!...at a discount of $100.!
Ordered online Monday...it was delivered on Wednesday...again great service!
What else can i add?.other than AV Gear will surely see more business coming their way from this address in Ottawa. Many thanks.
